mobios.app
类 BuildVPIndex

java.lang.Object
  mobios.app.BuildVPIndex

public class BuildVPIndex
extends java.lang.Object

This is the main entry point for building a VP Index. It can build either one one VPIndex, or a series of VPIndexes. The basic commandline options are: -n [data file name] -psm [the pivot selection selection method: random, fft, center, pcaonfft, pca] -v [number of pivots in an index node] -dpm [data partition method: balanced, clusteringkmeans, clusteringboundary] -f [fanout of a pivot] -m [maximum number of children in leaf nodes] -pl [path length, default 0] -t [data type, one of "protein", "dna", "vector", "image", "mass"] -g [debug level] -frag [fragment length, only meaningful for sequences] -dim [dimension of vector data to load] -b [whether bucketing will be used, 1: use] -r maximum radius for partition -seta the value of A in the incremental pivot selection -setn the value of N in the incremental pivot selection -o the prefix of the output index file -fftscale use for pcaonfft pivot selection method For build multiple databases, use the following options: -i [size of smallest database] -a [size of largest database] -s [step size of databases] The Metric is hardcoded for each data type.

版本：
2007.07.12
作者：
Rui Mao, Willard

removeFilesWithHeader

public static boolean removeFilesWithHeader(java.lang.String header)
remove all files with the given header, a utility method, not to be used by user.

参数：
header - header of file name, can have directory name, all files can be expressed as header* are deleted
返回：
true if runs successfully
